HarililakalpataruName.getInitialProps = async (param)=>{
    let { query  } = param;
    const { harililakalpataru_name  } = query;
    return {
        harililakalpataru_name

$RefreshReg$(_c, "HarililakalpataruName");


;
    // Wrapped in an IIFE to avoid polluting the global scope
    ;
    (function () {
        var _a, _b;
        // Legacy CSS implementations will `eval` browser code in a Node.js context
        // to extract CSS. For backwards compatibility, we need to check we're in a
        // browser context before continuing.
        if (typeof self !== 'undefined' &&
            // AMP / No-JS mode does not inject these helpers:
            '$RefreshHelpers$' in self) {
            // @ts-ignore __webpack_module__ is global
            var currentExports = __webpack_module__.exports;
            // @ts-ignore __webpack_module__ is global
            var prevExports = (_b = (_a = __webpack_module__.hot.data) === null || _a === void 0 ? void 0 : _a.prevExports) !== null && _b !== void 0 ? _b : null;
            // This cannot happen in MainTemplate because the exports mismatch between
            // templating and execution.
            self.$RefreshHelpers$.registerExportsForReactRefresh(currentExports, __webpack_module__.id);
            // A module can be accepted automatically based on its exports, e.g. when
            // it is a Refresh Boundary.
            if (self.$RefreshHelpers$.isReactRefreshBoundary(currentExports)) {
                // Save the previous exports on update so we can compare the boundary
                // signatures.
                __webpack_module__.hot.dispose(function (data) {
                    data.prevExports = currentExports;
                });
                // Unconditionally accept an update to this module, we'll check if it's
                // still a Refresh Boundary later.
                // @ts-ignore importMeta is replaced in the loader
                import.meta.webpackHot.accept();
                // This field is set when the previous version of this module was a
                // Refresh Boundary, letting us know we need to check for invalidation or
                // enqueue an update.
                if (prevExports !== null) {
                    // A boundary can become ineligible if its exports are incompatible
                    // with the previous exports.
                    //
                    // For example, if you add/remove/change exports, we'll want to
                    // re-execute the importing modules, and force those components to
                    // re-render. Similarly, if you convert a class component to a
                    // function, we want to invalidate the boundary.
                    if (self.$RefreshHelpers$.shouldInvalidateReactRefreshBoundary(prevExports, currentExports)) {
                        __webpack_module__.hot.invalidate();
                    }
                    else {
                        self.$RefreshHelpers$.scheduleUpdate();
                    }
                }
            }
            else {
                // Since we just executed the code for the module, it's possible that the
                // new exports made it ineligible for being a boundary.
                // We only care about the case when we were _previously_ a boundary,
                // because we already accepted this update (accidental side effect).
                var isNoLongerABoundary = prevExports !== null;
                if (isNoLongerABoundary) {
                    __webpack_module__.hot.invalidate();
                }
            }
        }
    })();
ø␀␀␀webpack://./node_modules/next/dist/compiled/@next/react-refresh-utils/dist/loader.js!./node_modules/next/dist/build/webpack/loaders/next-swc-loader.js??ruleSet[1].rules[1].oneOf[2].use[1]!./src/pages/harililakalpataru/[...harililakalpataru_name].jsà]␀␀{"version":3,"sources":["webpack://./src/pages/harililakalpataru/[...harililakalpataru_name].js"],"sourcesContent":["import React, { useEffect, useState } from \"react\";\r\nimport { useDebounce } from \"use-debounce\";\r\nimport { FaAngleLeft, FaAngleRight } from \"react-icons/fa\";\r\nimport { useRouter } from \"next/router\";\r\nimport Link from \"next/link\";\r\nimport axios from \"axios\";\r\nimport { convertToHindi } from \"@/utils/ashtadhyayi/Function\";\r\nimport LottieAnimation from \"@/components/LottieAnimation \";\r\nimport TitleCard from \"@/components/Card/TitleCard\";\r\nimport ShabdaChhedaCardInLine from \"@/components/Card/ShabdaChhedaCardInLine\";\r\nimport { Noto_Serif_Devanagari, Noto_Serif_Gujarati } from \"next/font/google\";\r\n\r\nconst gujarati = Noto_Serif_Gujarati({\r\n  subsets: [\"gujarati\"],\r\n});\r\n\r\nconst devanagari = Noto_Serif_Devanagari({\r\n  subsets: [\"devanagari\"],\r\n});\r\n\r\nconst HarililakalpataruName = ({ harililakalpataru_name }) => {\r\n  const router = useRouter();\r\n  const [currentSkanda, setCurrentSkanda] = useState({});\r\n  const [currentAdhyayList, setCurrentAdhyayList] = useState([]);\r\n  const [currentVersesList, setCurrentVersesList] = useState([]);\r\n  const [currentAdhyay, setCurrentAdhyay] = useState([]);\r\n  const [harililakalpataruSkanda, setHarililakalpataruSkanda] = useState([]);\r\n\r\n  const getAllSkanda = async () => {\r\n    try {\r\n      const response = await axios.get(\"/api/harililakalpataru/skanda\");\r\n      setHarililakalpataruSkanda(response?.data?.data);\r\n    } catch (error) {\r\n      console.error(\"Error geting data:\", error);\r\n    }\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  const getCurrentSkanda = async (id) => {\r\n    try {\r\n      const response = await axios.get(\"/api/harililakalpataru/skanda\", {\r\n        params: {\r\n          id: id,\r\n        },\r\n      });\r\n      setCurrentSkanda(response.data.data);\r\n      return;\r\n    } catch (error) {\r\n      console.error(\"Error geting data:\", error);\r\n    }\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  const getCurrentAdhyayList = async (id) => {\r\n    try {\r\n      const response = await axios.get(\"/api/harililakalpataru/adhyay\", {\r\n        params: {\r\n          skandaId: id,\r\n        },\r\n      });\r\n      setCurrentAdhyayList(response.data.data);\r\n      return;\r\n    } catch (error) {\r\n      console.error(\"Error geting data:\", error);\r\n    }\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  const getCurrentAdhyay = async (skandaId, id) => {\r\n    try {\r\n      const response = await axios.get(\"/api/harililakalpataru/adhyay\", {\r\n        params: {\r\n          skandaId: skandaId,\r\n          id: id,\r\n        },\r\n      });\r\n      setCurrentAdhyay(response.data.data);\r\n      return;\r\n    } catch (error) {\r\n      console.error(\"Error geting data:\", error);\r\n    }\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  const getCurrentVersesList = async (skandaId, adhyayId) => {\r\n    try {\r\n      const response = await axios.get(\"/api/harililakalpataru/verses\", {\r\n        params: {\r\n          skandaId: skandaId,\r\n          adhyayId: adhyayId,\r\n        },\r\n      });\r\n      setCurrentVersesList(response.data.data);\r\n      return;\r\n    } catch (error) {\r\n      console.error(\"Error getCurrentVersesList data:\", error);\r\n    }\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  useEffect(() => {\r\n    getAllSkanda();\r\n    if (harililakalpataru_name.length >= 1) {\r\n      getCurrentSkanda(harililakalpataru_name[0]);\r\n      getCurrentAdhyayList(harililakalpataru_name[0]);\r\n    } else {\r\n      setCurrentSkanda({});\r\n      setCurrentAdhyayList([]);\r\n    }\r\n    if (harililakalpataru_name.length >= 2) {\r\n      getCurrentAdhyay(harililakalpataru_name[0], harililakalpataru_name[1]);\r\n      getCurrentVersesList(\r\n        harililakalpataru_name[0],\r\n        harililakalpataru_name[1]\r\n      );\r\n    } else {\r\n      setCurrentAdhyay({});\r\n      setCurrentVersesList([]);\r\n    }\r\n  }, [router.query, harililakalpataru_name]);\r\n\r\n  // console.log(\"harililakalpataruSkanda----------\", harililakalpataruSkanda);\r\n  // console.log(\"currentSkanda----------\", currentSkanda);\r\n  // console.log(\"currentAdhyayList----------\", currentAdhyayList);\r\n  // console.log(\"currentAdhyay----------\", currentAdhyay);\r\n  // console.log(\"currentVersesList----------\", currentVersesList);\r\n\r\n  const handlePage = (page) => {\r\n    if (harililakalpataru_name.length == 1 && harililakalpataruSkanda) {\r\n      const currentObject = harililakalpataruSkanda?.find(\r\n        (obj) => obj.id == harililakalpataru_name[0]\r\n      );\r\n      const currentIndexInArray =\r\n        harililakalpataruSkanda?.indexOf(currentObject);\r\n      if (page == \"NEXT\") {\r\n        const nextObject = harililakalpataruSkanda[currentIndexInArray + 1];\r\n        return nextObject\r\n          ? nextObject.id\r\n          : harililakalpataru_name[harililakalpataru_name.length - 1];\r\n      }\r\n      if (page == \"PREVIOUS\") {\r\n        const nextObject = harililakalpataruSkanda[currentIndexInArray - 1];\r\n        return nextObject\r\n          ? nextObject.id\r\n          : harililakalpataru_name[harililakalpataru_name.length - 1];\r\n      }\r\n    } else if (harililakalpataru_name.length == 2 && currentAdhyayList) {\r\n      const currentObject = currentAdhyayList?.find(\r\n        (obj) => obj.id == harililakalpataru_name[1]\r\n      );\r\n      const currentIndexInArray = currentAdhyayList?.indexOf(currentObject);\r\n      if (page == \"NEXT\") {\r\n        const nextObject = currentAdhyayList[currentIndexInArray + 1];\r\n        return nextObject\r\n          ? `${harililakalpataru_name[0]}/${nextObject.id}`\r\n          : `${harililakalpataru_name[0]}/${\r\n              harililakalpataru_name[harililakalpataru_name.length - 1]\r\n            }`;\r\n      }\r\n      if (page == \"PREVIOUS\") {\r\n        const nextObject = currentAdhyayList[currentIndexInArray - 1];\r\n        return nextObject\r\n          ? `${harililakalpataru_name[0]}/${nextObject.id}`\r\n          : `${harililakalpataru_name[0]}/${\r\n              harililakalpataru_name[harililakalpataru_name.length - 1]\r\n            }`;\r\n      }\r\n    }\r\n    // else if (\r\n    //   harililakalpataru_name.length == 3 &&\r\n    //                fontFamily: `${devanagari.style.fontFamily}`,\r\n              }}\r\n                href={`/harililakalpataru/${currentSkanda?.id}`}\r\n              >\r\n                <div\r\n                  className=\"break-words text-center text-xs 2xs:text-sm xs:text-base md:text-lg lg:text-xl leading-6 sm:leading-9 mt-1\"\r\n            </div>\r\n                      <div className=\"inline-block break-words align-baseline font-bold text-red\">\r\n                        {e?.title}\r\n                      </div>\r\n                    </div>\r\n                  </Link>\r\n                );\r\n              })}\r\n            {currentSkanda?.footer && (\r\n              <div className=\"bg-card border-b p-2 flex          </div>\r\n        ) : harililakalpataru_name.length === 2 &&\r\n          currentVersesList.length > 0 ?                <div\r\n                  className=\"break-words text-center text-xs 2xs:text-sm xs:text-base md:text-lg lg:text-xl leading-6 sm:leading-9 mt-1\"\r\n `
œ@/utils/ashtadhyayi/Functionÿc␀>`@/components/LottieAnimation ÿc␀<`›@/components/Card/TitleCardÿc␀4`¨@/components/Card/ShabdaChhedaCardInLineÿc␀N‰useRouterşA“␀␀œ␀␀ïïÿcˆuseStateşAÎ␀␀Ö␀␀ååÿc.6üûA␀␀␀␀ââÿc6>ùøAV␀␀^␀␀ßßÿc6>öõA’␀␀š␀␀ÜÜÿc.6óòAâ␀␀ê␀␀ÙÙÿcBJ9ÿÿÿƒgetàAf␀␀o␀␀

iÿÿÿiÿÿÿÿ@>␀␀`6@>␀␀`D˜™A¦J␀␀­J␀␀TÿÿÿTÿÿÿÿ@D␀␀`6@D␀␀`=•–AhP␀␀oP␀␀QÿÿÿQÿÿÿÿ@X␀␀`~AX␀␀…␀␀␀’“AQ␀␀Q␀␀NÿÿÿNÿÿÿÿ@Z␀␀`4@Z␀␀`;A…V␀␀ŒV␀␀KÿÿÿKÿÿÿÿ@n␀␀`o@n␀␀`vŒAgW␀␀nW␀␀HÿÿÿHÿÿÿÿ@q␀␀`~Aq␀␀…␀␀␀‰ŠAX␀␀X␀␀EÿÿÿEÿÿÿÿ@s␀␀`4@s␀␀`;†‡A×\␀␀Ş\␀␀BÿÿÿBÿÿÿÿ@ƒ␀␀`1@ƒ␀␀`8ƒ„A
^␀␀^␀␀?ÿÿÿ?ÿÿÿÿ@†␀␀`2@†␀␀`9äãA_␀␀*_␀␀
NÿÿÿNÿÿÿÿ@ˆ␀␀`2@ˆ␀␀`@}ÿÿÿ~ÿÿÿAa␀␀a␀␀9ÿÿÿ9ÿÿÿÿ@␀␀`m@␀␀`tŸşÿÿ–ShabdaChhedaCardInLineAa␀␀*a␀␀`MÿÿÿMÿÿÿÿ@␀␀`uA␀␀‹␀␀␀vÿÿÿwÿÿÿAde␀␀ke␀␀2ÿÿÿ2ÿÿÿÿ@␀␀`~A␀␀…␀␀␀sÿÿÿtÿÿÿAf␀␀f␀␀/ÿÿÿ/ÿÿÿÿ@Ÿ␀␀`4@Ÿ␀␀`;pÿÿÿqÿÿÿA;k␀␀Bk␀␀,ÿÿÿ,ÿÿÿÿ@³␀␀`)@³␀␀`0’şÿÿLottieAnimationACk␀␀Rk␀␀`<ÿÿÿ<ÿÿÿÿ@³␀␀`1@³␀␀`@Aÿÿÿ@ÿÿÿA{n␀␀„n␀␀1ÿÿÿ1ÿÿÿÿ@Æ␀␀@Æ␀␀`	ÿÿÿ
ÿÿÿ€@Ñ␀␀␀@Ñ␀␀`%␀‡sources“runtimeRequirements„dataSşÿÿŠjavascript«webpack/lib/util/registerExternalSerializerœwebpack-sources/CachedSource␀␀␀ô␀␀«webpack/lib/util/registerExternalSerializerœwebpack-sources/ConcatSource€«webpack/lib/util/registerExternalSerializer™webpack-sources/RawSource„␀␀__webpack_require__.r(__webpack_exports__);
/* harmony import */ var react_jsx_dev_runtime__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_0__ = __webpack_require__(/*! react/jsx-dev-runtime */ "./node_modules/react/jsx-dev-runtime.js");

/* harmony import */ var next_font_google_target_css_path_src_pages_harililakalpataru_harililakalpataru_name_js_import_Noto_Serif_Devanagari_arguments_subsets_devanagari_variableName_devanagari___WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_10__ = __webpack_require__(/*! next/font/google/target.css?{"path":"src\\pages\\harililakalpataru\\[...harililakalpataru_name].js","import":"Noto_Serif_Devanagari","arguments":[{"subsets":["devanagari"]}],"variableName":"devanagari"} */ "./node_modules/next/font/google/target.css?{\"path\":\"src\\\\pages\\\\harililakalpataru\\\\[...harililakalpataru_name].js\",\"import\":\"Noto_Serif_Devanagari\",\"arguments\":[{\"subsets\":[\"devanagari\"]}],\"variableName\":\"devanagari\"}");
/* harmony import */ var next_font_google_target_css_path_src_pages_harililakalpataru_harililakalpataru_name_js_import_Noto_Serif_Devanagari_arguments_subsets_devanagari_variableName_devanagari___WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_10___default = /*#__PURE__*/__webpack_require__.n(next_font_google_target_css_path_src_pages_harililakalpataru_harililakalpataru_name_js_import_Noto_Serif_Devanagari_arguments_subsets_devanagari_variableName_devanagari___WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_10__);
/* harmony import */ var react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__ = __webpack_require__(/*! react */ "./node_modules/react/index.js");
/* harmony import */ var react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1___default = /*#__PURE__*/__webpack_require__.n(react__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_1__);
/* harmony import */ var react_icons_fa__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_9__ = __webpack_require__(/*! react-icons/fa */ "./node_modules/react-icons/fa/index.esm.js");
/* harmony import */ var next_router__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__ = __webpack_require__(/*! next/router */ "./node_modules/next/router.js");
/* harmony import */ var next_router__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2___default = /*#__PURE__*/__webpack_require__.n(next_router__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_2__);
/* harmony import */ var next_link__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__ = __webpack_require__(/*! next/link */ "./node_modules/next/link.js");
/* harmony import */ var next_link__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3___default = /*#__PURE__*/__webpack_require__.n(next_link__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_3__);
/* harmony import */ var axios__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_8__ = __webpack_require__(/*! axios */ "./node_modules/axios/index.js");
/* harmony import */ var _utils_ashtadhyayi_Function__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_4__ = __webpack_require__(/*! @/utils/ashtadhyayi/Function */ "./src/utils/ashtadhyayi/Function.js");
/* harmony import */ var _components_LottieAnimation___WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_5__ = __webpack_require__(/*! @/components/LottieAnimation  */ "./src/components/LottieAnimation .js");
/* harmony import */ var _components_Card_TitleCard__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_6__ = __webpack_require__(/*! @/components/Card/TitleCard */ "./src/components/Card/TitleCard.js");
/* harmony import */ var _components_Card_ShabdaChhedaCardInLine__WEBPACK_IMPORTED_MODULE_7__ = __webpack_require__(/*! @/components/Card/ShabdaChhedaCardInLine */ "./src/components/Card/ShabdaChhedaCardInLine.js");
«webpack/lib/util/registerExternalSerializerwebpack-sources/ReplaceSource«webpack/lib/util/registerExternalSerializerŸwebpack-sources/SourceMapSource0}␀␀import { jsxDEV as _jsxDEV } from "react/jsx-dev-runtime";
var _s = $RefreshSig$();
import gujarati from 'next/font/google/target.css?{"path":"src\\\\pages\\\\harililakalpataru\\\\[...harililakalpataru_name].js","import":"Noto_Serif_Gujarati","arguments":[{"subsets":["gujarati"]}],"variableName":"gujarati"}';
import devanagari from 'next/font/google/target.css?{"path":"src\\\\pages\\\\harililakalpataru\\\\[...harililakalpataru_name].js","import":"Noto_Serif_Devanagari","arguments":[{"subsets":["devanagari"]}],"variableName":"devanagari"}';
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react";
import { useDebounce } from "use-debounce";
import { FaAngleLeft, FaAngleRight } from "react-icons/fa";
import { useRouter } from "next/router";
import Link from "next/link";
import axios from "axios";
import { convertToHindi } from "@/utils/ashtadhyayi/Function";
import LottieAnimation from "@/components/LottieAnimation ";
import TitleCard from "@/components/Card/TitleCard";
import ShabdaChhedaCardInLine from "@/components/Card/ShabdaChhedaCardInLine";
const HarililakalpataruName = (param)=>{
    let { harililakalpataru_name  } = param;
    _s();
    const router = useRouter();
    const [currentSkanda, setCurrentSkanda] = useState({});
    const [currentAdhyayList, setCurrentAdhyayList] = useState([]);
    const [currentVersesList, setCurrentVersesList] = useState([]);
    const [currentAdhyay, setCurrentAdhyay] = useState([]);
    const [harililakalpataruSkanda, setHarililakalpataruSkanda] = useState([]);
    const getAllSkanda = async ()=>{
        try {
            var _response_data;
            const response = await axios.get("/api/harililakalpataru/skanda");
            setHarililakalpataruSkanda(response === null || response === void 0 ? void 0 : (_response_data = response.data) === null || _response_data === void 0 ? void 0 : _response_data.data);
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Error geting data:", error);
        }
    };
    const getCurrentSkanda = async (id)=>{
        try {
            const response = await axios.get("/api/harililakalpataru/skanda", {
                params: {
                    id: id
                }
            });
            setCurrentSkanda(response.data.data);
            return;
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Error geting data:", error);
        }
    };
    const getCurrentAdhyayList = async (id)=>{
        try {
            const response = await axios.get("/api/harililakalpataru/adhyay", {
                params: {
                    skandaId: id
                }
            });
            setCurrentAdhyayList(response.data.data);
            return;
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Error geting data:", error);
        }
    };
    const getCurrentAdhyay = async (skandaId, id)=>{
        try {
            const response = await axios.get("/api/harililakalpataru/adhyay", {
                params: {
                    skandaId: skandaId,
                    id: id
                }
            });
            setCurrentAdhyay(response.data.data);
            return;
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Error geting data:", error);
        }
    };
    const getCurrentVersesList = async (skandaId, adhyayId)=>{
        try {
            const response = await axios.get("/api/harililakalpataru/verses", {
                params: {
                    skandaId: skandaId,
                    adhyayId: adhyayId
                }
            });
            setCurrentVersesList(response.data.data);
            return;
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Error getCurrentVersesList data:", error);
        }
    };
    useEffect(()=>{
        getAllSkanda();
        if (harililakalpataru_name.length >= 1) {
            getCurrentSkanda(harililakalpataru_name[0]);
            getCurrentAdhyayList(harililakalpataru_name[0]);
        } else {
            setCurrentSkanda({});
            setCurrentAdhyayList([]);
        }
        if (harililakalpataru_name.length >= 2) {
            getCurrentAdhyay(harililakalpataru_name[0], harililakalpataru_name[1]);
            getCurrentVersesList(harililakalpataru_name[0], harililakalpataru_name[1]);
        } else {
            setCurrentAdhyay({});
            setCurrentVersesList([]);
        }
    }, [
        router.query,
        harililakalpataru_name
    ]);
    // console.log("harililakalpataruSkanda----------", harililakalpataruSkanda);
    // console.log("currentSkanda----------", currentSkanda);
    // console.log("currentAdhyayList----------", currentAdhyayList);
    // console.log("currentAdhyay----------", currentAdhyay);
    // console.log("currentVersesList----------", currentVersesList);
    const handlePage = (page)=>{
        if (harililakalpataru_name.length == 1 && harililakalpataruSkanda) {
            const currentObject = harililakalpataruSkanda === null || harililakalpataruSkanda === void 0 ? void 0 : harililakalpataruSkanda.find((obj)=>obj.id == harililakalpataru_name[0]);
            const currentIndexInArray = harililakalpataruSkanda === null || harililakalpataruSkanda === void 0 ? void 0 : harililakalpataruSkanda.indexOf(currentObject);
            if (page == "NEXT") {
                const nextObject = harililakalpataruSkanda[currentIndexInArray + 1];
                return nextObject ? nextObject.id : harililakalpataru_name[harililakalpataru_name.length - 1];
            }
            if (page == "PREVIOUS") {
                const nextObject = harililakalpataruSkanda[currentIndexInArray - 1];
                return nextObject ? nextObject.id : harililakalpataru_name[harililakalpataru_name.length - 1];
            }
        } else if (harililakalpataru_name.length == 2 && currentAdhyayList) {
            const currentObject = currentAdhyayList === null || currentAdhyayList === void 0 ? void 0 : currentAdhyayList.find((obj)=>obj.id == harililakalpataru_name[1]);
            const currentIndexInArray = currentAdhyayList === null || currentAdhyayList === void 0 ? void 0 : currentAdhyayList.indexOf(currentObject);
            if (page == "NEXT") {
                const nextObject = currentAdhyayList[currentIndexInArray + 1];
                return nextObject ? "".concat(harililakalpataru_name[0], "/").concat(nextObject.id) : "".concat(harililakalpataru_name[0], "/").concat(harililakalpataru_name[harililakalpataru_name.length - 1]);
            }
            if (page == "PREVIOUS") {
                const nextObject = currentAdhyayList[currentIndexInArray - 1];
                return nextObject ? "".concat(harililakalpataru_name[0], "/").concat(nextObject.id) : "".concat(harililakalpataru_name[0], "/").concat(harililakalpataru_name[harililakalpataru_name.length - 1]);
            }
        }
    // else if (
    //   harililakalpataru_name.length == 3 &&

_c = HarililakalpataruName;
HarililakalpataruName.getInitialProps = async (param)=>{
    let { query  } = param;
    const { harililakalpataru_name  } = query;
    return {
        harililakalpataru_name
    };
};

var _c;
$RefreshReg$(_c, "HarililakalpataruName");


;
    // Wrapped in an IIFE to avoid polluting the global scope
    ;
    (function () {
        var _a, _b;
        // Legacy CSS implementations will `eval` browser code in a Node.js context
        // to extract CSS. For backwards compatibility, we need to check we're in a
        // browser context before continuing.
        if (typeof self !== 'undefined' &&
            // AMP / No-JS mode does not inject these helpers:
            '$RefreshHelpers$' in self) {
            // @ts-ignore __webpack_module__ is global
            var currentExports = __webpack_module__.exports;
            // @ts-ignore __webpack_module__ is global
            var prevExports = (_b = (_a = __webpack_module__.hot.data) === null || _a === void 0 ? void 0 : _a.prevExports) !== null && _b !== void 0 ? _b : null;
            // This cannot happen in MainTemplate because the exports mismatch between
            // templating and execution.
            self.$RefreshHelpers$.registerExportsForReactRefresh(currentExports, __webpack_module__.id);
            // A module can be accepted automatically based on its exports, e.g. when
            // it is a Refresh Boundary.
            if (self.$RefreshHelpers$.isReactRefreshBoundary(currentExports)) {
                // Save the previous exports on update so we can compare the boundary
                // signatures.
                __webpack_module__.hot.dispose(function (data) {
                    data.prevExports = currentExports;
                });
                // Unconditionally accept an update to this module, we'll check if it's
                // still a Refresh Boundary later.
                // @ts-ignore importMeta is replaced in the loader
                import.meta.webpackHot.accept();
                // This field is set when the previous version of this module was a
                // Refresh Boundary, letting us know we need to check for invalidation or
                // enqueue an update.
                if (prevExports !== null) {
                    // A boundary can become ineligible if its exports are incompatible
                    // with the previous exports.
                    //
                    // For example, if you add/remove/change exports, we'll want to
                    // re-execute the importing modules, and force those components to
                    // re-render. Similarly, if you convert a class component to a
                    // function, we want to invalidate the boundary.
                    if (self.$RefreshHelpers$.shouldInvalidateReactRefreshBoundary(prevExports, currentExports)) {
                        __webpack_module__.hot.invalidate();
                    }
                    else {
                        self.$RefreshHelpers$.scheduleUpdate();
                    }
                }
            }
            else {
                // Since we just executed the code for the module, it's possible that the
                // new exports made it ineligible for being a boundary.
                // We only care about the case when we were _previously_ a boundary,
                // because we already accepted this update (accidental side effect).
                var isNoLongerABoundary = prevExports !== null;
                if (isNoLongerABoundary) {
                    __webpack_module__.hot.invalidate();
                }
            }
        }
    })();
ø␀␀␀webpack://./node_modules/next/dist/compiled/@next/react-refresh-utils/dist/loader.js!./node_modules/next/dist/build/webpack/loaders/next-swc-loader.js??ruleSet[1].rules[1].oneOf[2].use[1]!./src/pages/harililakalpataru/[...harililakalpataru_name].jsà]␀␀{"version":3,"sources":["webpack://./src/pages/harililakalpataru/[...harililakalpataru_name].js"],"sourcesContent":["import \"next/router\";\r\nimport Link from \"next/link\";\r\nimport axios from \"axios\";\r\nimport { convertToHindi } from \"@/utils/ashtadhyayi/Function\";\r\nimport LottieAnimation from \"@/components/LottieAnimation \";\r\nimport TitleCard from \"@/components/Card/TitleCard\";\r\nimport ShabdaChhedaCardInLine from \"@/components/Card/ShabdaChhedaCardInLine\";\r\nimport { Noto_Serif_Devanagari, Noto_Serif_Gujarati } from \"next/font/google\";\r\n\r\nconst gujarati = Noto_Serif_Gujarati({\r\n  subsets: [\"gujarati\"],\r\n});\r\n\r\nconst devanagari = Noto_Serif_Devanagari({\r\n  subsets: [\"devanagari\"],\r\n});\r\n\r\nconst HarililakalpataruName = ({ harililakalpataru_name }) => {\r\n  const router = useRouter();\r\n  const [currentSkanda, setCurrentSkanda] = useState({});\r\n  const [currentAdhyayList, setCurrentAdhyayList] = useState([]);\r\n  const [currentVersesList, setCurrentVersesList] = useState([]);\r\n  const [currentAdhyay, setCurrentAdhyay] = useState([]);\r\n  const [harililakalpataruSkanda, setHarililakalpataruSkanda] = useState([]);\r\n\r\n  const getAllSkanda = async () => {\r\n    try {\r\n      const response = await axios.get(\"/api/harililakalpataru/skanda\");\r\n      setHarililakalpataruSkanda(response?.data?.data);\r\n    } catch (error) {\r\n      console.error(\"Error geting data:\", error);\r\n    }\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  const getCurrentSkanda = async (id) => {\r\n    try {\r\n      const response = await axios.get(\"/api/harililakalpataru/skanda\", {\r\n        params: {\r\n          id: id,\r\n        },\r\n      });\r\n      setCurrentSkanda(response.data.data);\r\n      return;\r\n    } catch (error) {\r\n      console.error(\"Error geting data:\", error);\r\n    }\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  const getCurrentAdhyayList = async (id) => {\r\n    try {\r\n      const response = await axios.get(\"/api/harililakalpataru/adhyay\", {\r\n        params: {\r\n          skandaId: id,\r\n        },\r\n      });\r\n      setCurrentAdhyayList(response.data.data);\r\n      return;\r\n    } catch (error) {\r\n      console.error(\"Error geting data:\", error);\r\n    }\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  const getCurrentAdhyay = async (skandaId, id) => {\r\n    try {\r\n      const response = await axios.get(\"/api/harililakalpataru/adhyay\", {\r\n        params: {\r\n          skandaId: skandaId,\r\n          id: id,\r\n        },\r\n      });\r\n      setCurrentAdhyay(response.data.data);\r\n      return;\r\n    } catch (error) {\r\n      console.error(\"Error geting data:\", error);\r\n    }\r\n  };\r\n\r\n  const getCurrentVersesList = async (skandaId, adhyayId) => {\r\n    try {\r\n      const response = await axios.get(\"/api/harililakalpataru/verses\", {\r\n        params: {\r\n          skandaId: skandaId,\r\n          adhyayId: adhyayId,\r\n        },\r\n
